title: The Moth Radio Hour: Live from the United Palace
description:
A special episode live from the United Palace in Washington Heights, New York. Subway station romance, lost names, and buried truths. This episode is hosted by CJ Hunt, with additional hosting by Jay Allison, producer of The Moth Radio Hour.

Hosted by: CJ Hunt and Jay Allison

Storytellers: Lin Manuel Miranda, Quiara Alegria Hudes, Led Black
itunes:subtitle: The first Moth Radio Hour with a live-and-in-person audience since 2020!
itunes:author: The Moth
